entry.title: Dense Fog Advisory issued July 31 at 7:44AM AKDT until July 31 at 10:00AM AKDT by NWS

entry.title: Special Weather Statement issued July 31 at 8:32AM PDT by NWS
entry.summary: ...Increasing Shower and Thunderstorm Chances... While not as hot as previous days, we will see one more afternoon where temperatures will be well above average. entry.title: Red Flag Warning issued July 31 at 5:03AM PDT until July 31 at 11:00PM PDT by NWS
entry.summary: ...Abundant Lightning On Dry Fuels Expected through Monday... .Heat, instability, and increasing moisture along with multiple low pressure impulses moving through Monday are expected to bring scattered thunderstorms and abundant lightning on dry fuels to the area. Today into Monday, an approaching low pressure system will bring more abundant lightning to areas from the Marble Mountains
entry.cap:areaDesc: Central Siskiyou County Including Shasta Valley; Siskiyou County from the Cascade Mountains East and South to Mt Shasta; Western Klamath National Forest
